title: JSW Group appoints Rajiv Mehta as Chief of mobility arm
description: JSW Group has appointed Rajiv Mehta as Chief of Business for its mobility arm, JSW Auto. Based in Mumbai, Mehta will report to Parth Jindal and work closely with Chairman Sajjan Jindal. His extensive experience in the automotive sector will support JSW's expansion into the electric vehicle market.
